resources.string: Effortlessly manage your schedule and book appointments in just a few taps! Whether you’re a client looking to book time or a provider managing availability, we’ve made it simple and convenient for you to stay on top of your day.

string-array.name: app_home_detail_list
string-array.item: Manage your appointments on the go

resources.string: Your time, perfectly organized. Let’s get started!

To schedule an appointment, simply view the available time slots and select a 15-minute session that works for you. Please note that all appointments must be reserved at least 24 hours in advance. Manage your bookings easily and stay on top of your schedule. If you need further assistance, feel free to contact support.
Plan Ahead with Ease – Book Your Appointments in Advance

string-array.name: info_detail_list
string-array.item: Flexible Scheduling: Browse and book available time slots based on your convenience.
15-Minute Sessions: All appointments are set in 15-minute increments for precision.
24-Hour Reservation Requirement: Ensure you book your appointment at least 24 hours in advance.
Manage Your Appointments: View, reschedule, or cancel your bookings with ease.
Real-time Updates: Get instant notifications and reminders for your upcoming appointments.

string-array.name: info_footer
string-array.item: Your appointments, planned to perfection. For any help, reach out to our support team.

resources.string: Select a time from available slot
Please book your appointment at least 24 hours in advance.
